title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + FOI in Europe: Pioneering in a complex legal situation.
description: Explains the nuts and bolts of Freedom of Information (FOI) in the U.S. and Europe, including the EU's Access to Documents regulation and Directive on public access to environmental information.
